Articles.Content:
Welcome to the super rover drop extravagansa!This is a race to drop a rover onto the mun,the island runway,the KSC,and as a bonus the mountains west of the KSC in the shortest time.

Rules

The rover must carry at least one kerbal,a scientific instrument,must be capable of never running out of electricity,and has to be able to be (obviously) para dropped.

You can use as many mods as you like except for Mechjeb and any cheaty mods.Please don't be cheeky.

Parachutes are alowed.

No debug menu,infigliders,kraken drives,ect.

No rockets except for the mun para drop.

BTW when I me a mun para drop I mean you drop the rover out of a craft and land it.Also this challenge is meant to be for not really experienced players.

Screenshots of your full craft,rover and rover at each site.If the atmospheric craft(including rover) are the same no need to do extra screenshots.

Please tell me if anything is missing:).

Leaderboard

1

2

3
Do you need to drop all rovers in one go? Or is it one separate category per rover para-drop?

I'm not sure this is really feasible. Unless you are very low to the ground and moving very slow your para-dropped rover will despawn before reaching the ground. Also, never running out of electricity could be interpreted as just having one RTG. You are never out if you are making power.

You win by dropping the rovers in seperate missions in the shortest time.Rasip I mean what you said.The carrier aircraft doesnt have to survive.And i mean never run out of electricity by RTGs.Some rovers need more than one.
